    • Method Detail

      • resetCursor

        public void resetCursor()
        Moves the cursor reference to root.

      • changeDirectory

        public void changeDirectory(java.lang.String name)
                     throws NotADirectoryException
        Changes the cursor reference to a given name.
        Parameters:
        name - String that can relative or absolute path.
        Throws:
        NotADirectoryException - Thrown when the name corresponds to a file.

      • presentWorkingDirectory

        public java.lang.String presentWorkingDirectory()
        Gets the current working directory.
        Returns:
        String representing the path of the working directory.

      • listDirectory

        public java.lang.String listDirectory()
        List all child of the working directory.
        Returns:
        String containing all child of the working directory.

      • printDirectoryTree

        public void printDirectoryTree()
        Prints the directory from the cursor.

      • makeDirectory

        public void makeDirectory(java.lang.String name)
                   throws FullDirectoryException,
                          java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Create a bew child directory under the cursor.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of new Directory.
        Throws:
        FullDirectoryException - Thrown when no more child can be added.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when the name isn't usable.

      • makeFile

        public void makeFile(java.lang.String name)
              throws FullDirectoryException,
                     java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates child file under cursor.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the new file child.
        Throws:
        FullDirectoryException - Thrown when the cursor cannot add more.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when the name isn't usable.

      • findFile

        public java.lang.String findFile(java.lang.String name)
        Finds a file/directory in the tree.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the file or directory.
        Returns:
        Returns a string containing all of the paths to nodes with the same name.

      • printFindFile

        public java.lang.String printFindFile(java.lang.String name,
                                      DirectoryNode node,
                                      java.lang.String path,
                                      java.lang.String output)
        Recursive method to get the path to a node with a given name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the node to find.
        node - The node to check in that method call.
        path - Path taken to get to a node.
        output - String containing the found paths.
        Returns:
        Returns output after it runs through all possibilities.

      • moveFile

        public void moveFile(java.lang.String src,
                     java.lang.String dst)
        Moves a node from one place to another.
        Parameters:
        src - Absolute path of the source node.
        dst - Absolute path of the destination node.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when any of the parameters isn't valid.
